description:
Unit 14 How often does he have sports?

【读听选答】

Because Daisy didn't have a dog in her family, she took her friends' dogs for a walk each day of the week.
由于黛丝家里没有狗，所以她就每周每天带她朋友的狗去散步。
On Mondays she took Jungle, on Tuesdays Emma, on Wednesdays June, on Thursday Lorry, on Fridays Rainbow, on Saturdays Woody and on Sundays Mighty.
在星期一她带丛林，星期二是艾玛，星期三是橘，星期四是洛瑞，星期五是彩虹，星期六是伍迪，星期天是麦特。
Then Mighty moved away, so Daisy was free on Sundays.
麦特走了之后，黛丝就空闲了。
One day she  heard a terrible noise.
一天她听到奇怪的声音。
She looked out of the window and there were dogs pushing and pulling each other.
她往窗外看去，是狗狗们互相推推挤挤。
Before Daisy ran out to see the dogs, they all came and wanted her to take them for a walk on Sundays, too.
在黛丝跑出去看狗狗们之前，它们都进来想要让她在星期天也带它们出去散步。
Looking at the lovely dogs, Daisy said to the dogs, "I'll take you all out on Sundays."
看着可爱的狗狗们，黛丝和狗狗们说，“我在星期天会带你们出去。”
So every Sunday Daisy took all the dogs out.
所以每周星期天黛丝带所有的狗狗出去。
What fun they had together!
他们在一起是多么地快乐啊！

【唱唱跳跳】

How often, how often do you go to school?
你多久去一次学校？
How often, how often do you go to the zoo?
你多久去一次动物园？
How often, how often do you have sports?
你多久做一次运动？
How often, how often do you buy dolls?
你多久买一次娃娃？
How often, how often do you have a sandwich?
你多久吃一个三明治？
How often, how often do you eat a sausage?
你多久吃一个香肠？
How often, how often do you have a burger?
你多久吃一个汉堡包？
How often, how often do you eat pasta?
你多久吃一次意大利面？

回顾往期节目请到【剑桥少儿英语学习笔记】节目~欢迎订阅！

title: 剑桥少儿英语二级：第14课 他多久做一次运动

description:
Haley and Klaus are having a vamp/hybrid/were-baby together, but their connection pretty much ends there. "Hayley is, by no means, the Cinderella in the Klaus love story," executive producer Julie Plec says. "Hayley is a girl who's pretty tough, fiery, an independent spirit. She's going to have her own journey. She's not really meant to be a threat to Klaus' love life. If anything, she's the portal into his redemption."Haley和Klaus的确将会生出一个吸血鬼+狼人混血宝宝，但是他们的关系最多也就发展到这里。《The Originals》制作人Julie Plec说：“Hayley绝对不可能是Klaus爱情故事中的灰姑娘。Haley的确是个漂亮、热辣的姑娘，但她拥有非常独立精神。她将会拥有自己的旅程，也就是说她的存在不会影响Klaus的情感世界。如果一定要说她对Klaus的影响的话，那么她就是Klaus自我救赎的大门。

另外关于《吸血鬼日记》粉丝最关心的Klaus&Caroline，Klaus的扮演者Joseph Morgan是这样说的：

It's made reference to in the episode. Klaus makes reference to it. It's not like he's in this new place and he's like "Well, forget her!" I think the ideal thing for Klaus would be for her to come to New Orleans, and he's still enamored with her. They're not going to introduce a new love interest and immediately go, "Hey, he's with this girl now!" They respect the fans enough to keep acknowledging Caroline and potentially work in some crossovers.这个剧情之前的一集里有提到。Klaus说过这个问题。剧情不会是他到了一个新地方，然后就“好吧，忘了她！”我觉得对于Klaus去新奥尔良最理想的状态就是，他还是喜欢她。剧情不会立马就给Klaus介绍一个新 姑娘，说“喂！Klaus现在要和这个新姑娘在一起了！”剧组会充分尊重观众，所以Caroline也许也会来《The Originals》。

title: 《The Originals》最新剧透：Klaus和Haley绝对不会在一起！

description:
视频观看：

主讲老师：

五国混血美国人，世界第一公立大学加州伯克利全奖毕业，她会说流利的中文并有在高中任教的经历。

课堂教案：

Welcome to class today! Let’s start with some slang. Our slangs today are both about catching things. Do you know what catch means?欢迎来到今天的课，我们从俚语开始吧。我们今天的两个俚语都和“抓”这个词有关系。
The first slang is to "catch some Zs". Yes, we are talking about Zs, just like in the alphabet.第一个叫“catch some Zs”，对的，我们说的是字母表里的Z。
Zs are what are put in these little thought bubbles that come over people’s heads when they are asleep in cartoons. You might have seen this before.Z就是我们放在那些浮动泡泡里面的，在卡通里当一个人睡觉的时候就会出现，你可能之前见过这个。
So when you want to catch some Zs, you want to get some sleep.所以想抓一些Z就是想睡觉。
Because it’s just like you are catching the thoughts from those sleeping people’s minds.类似于从睡觉的人的意识里抓想法。
Our other slang is to "catch some rays". Rays are beams of light that come from the sun.我们另外一个俚语是“catch some rays”，“rays”的意思是太阳的射线。
So, to catch some rays means to 晒太阳.所以，它的意思是晒太阳。
If you catch enough rays, you will become tanned ,your skin will become darker and a lot of people like that.如果你晒太阳，你会变得黝黑，很多人都喜欢有黝黑的皮肤。
So people go outside to catch some rays during the summer or really any day that there is good weather.所以他们很喜欢在夏天和晴天的时候出去晒太阳。
And both of these slangs are used as verbs.这两个俚语都是当作动词来用的。
You can say, I'm tired, I'm going to go catch some Zs, if you want to say that you want to go sleep.你可以说，我困了，我要去睡觉了。
If you want to say that you are too pale and you want to get darker say "oh, it’s so nice outside, I’m going to go to the beach and catch some rays and maybe you can ask a friend to come along".如果你觉得自己太白皙了，想变得黝黑一些，你可以说“外面的天气真好，我要去海滩晒太阳，你也可以邀请朋友一起来。”
So, our example for sentence structure today is "In order for Jimmy to remain a part of this group, he’s going have to calm down".我们今天的句型是“Jimmy如果想留在这个组里，他需要平静自己的脾气”。
And the basic structure is "In order for A to do B, it’s going to have to C".基本句型是“如果A要去做B，A必须具备C才行”
A is our main subject. A wants to do B, but needs to do C to be able to do B.A是我们的主语。A想做B，但是需要做C才能够去做B。
Another example is, "In order for me to get a good grade on this exam I am going to have to study a lot".另外一个例子是“如果我想考一个好成绩，我需要好好学习”
Why don’t you try making a sentence?你也来试试造句吧
Thank you so much for coming to class today. I hope you learned something.谢谢你来上今天的课，我希望你学到了很多知识。
If you have any questions or comments, or if you want to try using the sentence structure,follow me on Weibo.如果你有任何问题或建议，或者在尝试用句型，来微博上关注我吧。

注意：本资料均来自互联网，仅学习之用。
